item.title: STAFF HUNTERS
item.dc:creator: moatazzsamir
item.content:encoded:
STAFF HUNTERS

More Than Recruitment Agency

With Staff Hunters we will provide you with creative human resources solutions, make white and blue collars hiring easier, and produce a perfect training material.

LET US KNOW HOW TO HELP YOU :

Fill a Simple and Short form and one of our team will contact you shortly.

EMPLOYER
JOB SEEKER

RECRUITMENT

A Full Recruitment Service with a high committed and accurate team that will the most efficient, well-trained calibers.

TRAINING SERVICES

A various programs for your personnel, including soft skills; communication skills, and negotiation skills. Additionally, we offer numerous corporate training.

HR SOLUTIONS

Provide a creative, easy and effective solutions for your daily and periodically human resources activities.

Find your matching job:

About

STAFF HUNTERS is a Company that provide HR Services for Both White Collars and Blue Collars.

Get in Touch

Reach out so we can work together to drive our services to your company.

staffhuntersegypt@gmail.com
(+20) 1096940442
Cairo
Egypt

Opening Hours

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: moatazzsamir
item.content:encoded:
Staff Hunters – Recruitment, Training and HR Solutions.

We are a group of different mentalities colleagues, what brings us together is our passion towards HUMAN RESOURCES, We are growing and we are happy to deal with you to BE A PARTNER.

item.title: Sales Representatives(Outdoor)
item.dc:creator: moatazzsamir
item.content:encoded:
A Real Estate company is hiring Sales Representatives to join the company immediately.

Job Description:

  • Interview clients to determine what kinds of properties they are seeking.
  • Visit properties to assess them before showing them to clients
  • Prepare documents such as representation contracts, purchase and lease agreements if needed.
  • Coordinate property closings, overseeing signing of documents and disbursement of funds.
  • Make pictures for the new units and add it to the data list
  • Compare a property with similar properties that have recently sold to determine its competitive market price.
  • Follow up with all new clients and offer them what are they looking for

Job Requirements:

-Bachelor's degree (Is Must)
-Excellent communication and negotiation skills
-(0:1) year experience #Working conditions:
-Computer skills

Job Specification:

-Location: New Cairo
-Fresh graduate are welcomed to apply
-(Basic Salary 3500 + High Commissions + Bonus + medical insurance + life insurance)
-Full Time job.

Apply

item.title: Introduce Yourself (Example Post)
item.dc:creator: moatazzsamir
item.content:encoded:
This is an example post, originally published as part of Blogging University. Enroll in one of our ten programs, and start your blog right.

You’re going to publish a post today. Don’t worry about how your blog looks. Don’t worry if you haven’t given it a name yet, or you’re feeling overwhelmed. Just click the “New Post” button, and tell us why you’re here.

Why do this?

  • Because it gives new readers context. What are you about? Why should they read your blog?
  • Because it will help you focus your own ideas about your blog and what you’d like to do with it.

The post can be short or long, a personal intro to your life or a bloggy mission statement, a manifesto for the future or a simple outline of your the types of things you hope to publish.

To help you get started, here are a few questions:

  • Why are you blogging publicly, rather than keeping a personal journal?
  • What topics do you think you’ll write about?
  • Who would you love to connect with via your blog?
  • If you blog successfully throughout the next year, what would you hope to have accomplished?

You’re not locked into any of this; one of the wonderful things about blogs is how they constantly evolve as we learn, grow, and interact with one another — but it’s good to know where and why you started, and articulating your goals may just give you a few other post ideas.

Can’t think how to get started? Just write the first thing that pops into your head. Anne Lamott, author of a book on writing we love, says that you need to give yourself permission to write a “crappy first draft”. Anne makes a great point — just start writing, and worry about editing it later.

When you’re ready to publish, give your post three to five tags that describe your blog’s focus — writing, photography, fiction, parenting, food, cars, movies, sports, whatever. These tags will help others who care about your topics find you in the Reader. Make sure one of the tags is “zerotohero,” so other new bloggers can find you, too.

item.title: Introduce Yourself (Example Post)
item.dc:creator: moatazzsamir
item.content:encoded:
This is an example post, originally published as part of Blogging University. Enroll in one of our ten programs, and start your blog right.

You’re going to publish a post today. Don’t worry about how your blog looks. Don’t worry if you haven’t given it a name yet, or you’re feeling overwhelmed. Just click the “New Post” button, and tell us why you’re here.

Why do this?

  • Because it gives new readers context. What are you about? Why should they read your blog?
  • Because it will help you focus your own ideas about your blog and what you’d like to do with it.

The post can be short or long, a personal intro to your life or a bloggy mission statement, a manifesto for the future or a simple outline of your the types of things you hope to publish.

To help you get started, here are a few questions:

  • Why are you blogging publicly, rather than keeping a personal journal?
  • What topics do you think you’ll write about?
  • Who would you love to connect with via your blog?
  • If you blog successfully throughout the next year, what would you hope to have accomplished?

You’re not locked into any of this; one of the wonderful things about blogs is how they constantly evolve as we learn, grow, and interact with one another — but it’s good to know where and why you started, and articulating your goals may just give you a few other post ideas.

Can’t think how to get started? Just write the first thing that pops into your head. Anne Lamott, author of a book on writing we love, says that you need to give yourself permission to write a “crappy first draft”. Anne makes a great point — just start writing, and worry about editing it later.

When you’re ready to publish, give your post three to five tags that describe your blog’s focus — writing, photography, fiction, parenting, food, cars, movies, sports, whatever. These tags will help others who care about your topics find you in the Reader. Make sure one of the tags is “zerotohero,” so other new bloggers can find you, too.

item.title: Customer Service Representative(English)
item.dc:creator: moatazzsamir
item.content:encoded:
We are hiring Customer Service Representative to join a multinational company immediately.

Job Description:

  • Providing technical support and billing queries for the customers in USA.
  • Handling English Customers complains/inquires job requirements.
  • Following call center “scripts” when handling different topics..
  • Identifying customers'needs, clarify information, research every issue and providing solutions.

Job Requirements:

-English Level : Fluent English Speaker.
-Males and Females.
-(0:1) year experience #Working conditions:
-Computer skills
-Graduates
-Excellent communication skills
-Flexibility with rotational shifts

Job Specification:

-Location: Alexandria
-(Gap year/Drop out) are welcome to apply.
-Salary : 8000 EGP (5500 Basic + 2500 KPI's)
-Social And Medical Insurance
-Transportation Provided door to door
-Full Time/Rotational Shifts (Evening/Night/Overnight)
-Working hours (9 working hours including one hour as a break/day, 5 days a week,2 days off/week)

Apply

item.title: Customer Service Representative(Arabic)
item.dc:creator: moatazzsamir
item.content:encoded:
We are hiring Customer Service Representative to join Telecommunication company immediately.

Job Description:

  • Providing technical support and billing queries for the customers
  • Handling Customers complains/inquires .
  • Following call center “scripts” when handling different topics..
  • Identifying customers'needs, clarify information, research every issue and providing solutions.

Job Requirements:

-English Level : Good English Speaker.
-Males and Females.
-(0:1) year experience #Working conditions:
-Computer skills
-Graduates
-Excellent communication skills
-Flexibility with rotational shifts

Job Specification:

-Career Path
-Location: 6th October
-(Salary 3000 to 5000)
-Social And Medical Insurance
-Transportation Provided from gathering points.
-Paid Training.
- VPN line
-Full Time/Rotational Shifts (Evening/Night/Overnight)
-Working hours (9 working hours including one hour as a break/day, 5 days a week,2 days off/week)

Apply

item.title: Sales Team Leader
item.dc:creator: moatazzsamir
item.content:encoded:
A Real Estate company is hiring Sales Team Leader to join the company immediately.

Job Description:

• Assist Managers in Sales Strategy Development
• Keep Informed of New Projects and prices
• Recruit, Train, and Coach the Sales Team
• Delegate Tasks and Set Deadlines
• Set Sales Targets and Motivate Sales Team
• Prepare Sales Reports

Job Requirements:

-Bachelor's degree (Is Must)
-Excellent communication and negotiation skills
-(2-4) years experience -Real Estate-
-Computer skills
- Fluency in English Is a Must

Job Specification:

-Location: New Cairo
-Experienced
-Salary Negotiable
-Full Time job.

Apply
